## R Markdown

This README file serves as an outline of today's topics and contains all required materials or links to the materials. Today's aim is

  - to explain the nature of the data for which a logistic regression can be performed, 
  - to explain the special properties of logistic regression as a special case of linear regression, 
  - to perform and interpret a logistic regression. 
  - At the end, examples from current research projects are shown.
